name: Abraham Shafi
overview:
Abe is an entrepreneur living in Berkeley, California. He is the founder of the highly acclaimed social recruiting platform getTalent.com.
After leaving Google, he has devoted the majority of his time to understanding how employers and job-seekers interact, and has presented numerous HR Technology Conferences.
In early 2009, he founded getTalent as an undergraduate at UC Berkeley. It started as his undergraduate thesis at UC Berkeley and grew into the business that it is today.
